author: andrew0893
title: Bone Cruncher Set Review
review:
This is my first 2012 Racers set.Set No. 9093 the BONE CRUNCHER.

Minifigures :A monster truck driver.Since the name of the set is the BONE CRUNCHER,I decided to call him Crunch.

Building Experience :It has an interesting internal body structure due to the SPECIAL EJECTION FUNCTION.Overall it was an interesting build.

Parts : Meh. A meagre 87 pieces pieces did not really satisfy me.They should have included a pit stop with an engineer with tools or something to crush or break through.Overall I did not really like the parts included.

Playability : Oh man,this thing is really fun to play with ESPECIALLY if you have another monster truck from this series.The most fun part is of course the EJECTION,crash it into a wall and Crunch just flys out. Plus,it looks GREAT when it is crushing all my LEGO POLICE STUFF.

Value for money : Not that cheap but yet not too expensive,if it is at this price,it should have included what I mentioned earlier.

Overall :This is fun set, just wished it had more parts.

This has been Andrew0893 speeding of in my BONE CRUNCHER.
